mapper.sql: suppiler_id, suppiler_no, suppiler_name, suppiler_type, suppiler_addr, linkman, linkman_tel, linkman_email, internetsite, isvail, isdel, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from o_suppiler
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
